class.name: CameraServer
class.brief_description: Server keeping track of different cameras accessible in Godot.
class.description: The [CameraServer] keeps track of different cameras accessible in Godot. These are external cameras such as webcams or the cameras on your phone. It is notably used to provide AR modules with a video feed from the camera. [b]Note:[/b] This class is currently only implemented on macOS and iOS. On other platforms, no [CameraFeed]s will be available.

method.name: add_feed
method.description: Adds the camera [code]feed[/code] to the camera server.

method.name: get_feed
method.description: Returns the [CameraFeed] corresponding to the camera with the given [code]index[/code].

signal.name: camera_feed_added
signal.description: Emitted when a [CameraFeed] is added (e.g. a webcam is plugged in).

signal.name: camera_feed_removed
signal.description: Emitted when a [CameraFeed] is removed (e.g. a webcam is unplugged).
